name: Eyed N' Seek
description:
Made for a game jam in under 48 hours!

You've lost all of your eyes! Where could they be?
Climb on walls and web-sling around the room to find your missing eyes. Use the clues visible from your 8 side cameras to help track them down. Activate "Hard Mode" to spice up your run with some extra tricky camera filters.

Developed by: 
Christian Nava: https://twitter.com/Chryis13
Conor Kou: https://twitter.com/conorkou
Evan Polekoff: https://twitter.com/epolekoff
Tiffany Chiu: https://twitter.com/tiffachiu
